subtitles.text: Well, it's started, Upcami. This time we have with us Shiori Nishida of Beyond Subway and Rio Sakurai of Morning Musume。 24.
This is a program that takes you behind the scenes of the production of various artists belonging to the Upfront Group.
We will show you our recording, rehearsal and other production processes.
Now then, let's start with a behind-the-scenes look at the two MCs. I, Nishida, would like to talk about the Hello Project concert in winter,
We have a rehearsal every time to check the sound before the show. During the rehearsal, when we were playing Beyonds's song, the other group members were really excited in the audience.
They get really excited.
It makes me very happy, and also Haruka Inoue from Morning Musume。 14's Haruka Inoue and Akko Yumeguita's growth because we are touring together,
I'm very happy to be able to see their growth. It's been a lot of fun.
It's something that only Halocon can do. It's really great to be able to tour together with other groups. It will be interesting if we don't start from now on, but I don't mean growing together,
I hope we can continue to improve the music we perform together.

I am really looking forward to the next year's 2.5.

If the timing was a little off, they would be caught in places they shouldn't be, so I imagined it was a very nerve-wracking shoot.
But everyone seemed to be having a great time, and the smiles were so natural that only a single shot could do, and the visuals were so cute!
I really want to look back at them over and over again. I thought it was a music video that made me want to fall in love with all of them.

It's time to say goodbye to Upokami, brought to you by Shiori Ishida and Rio Sakurai.
We've seen a lot of different videos this time, but for me, Sakurai, the music video shooting of Ocha no Oma-san's Good Luck's Chest Thumping left a deep impression.
Music video shoots are often done from morning till night in a very tight schedule, but I was very impressed with the music video shoots of various groups.
I love watching the making of music video shoots of various groups.
I like to watch the making of music videos of various groups and discover new things such as how the set was set up, or how the lip scene was shot with this kind of lighting.
I don't know...
I think that music videos create a worldview that is unique to the song, so I'm really looking forward to shooting more music videos of Morning Musume.
I'm sure Morning Musume。 I'm sure they will release music videos in the future, so please look forward to it!

I would like to see more growth of Morning Musume。

I think it fits her voice so well and it's so cool to hear it live.
I'd like to keep an eye on her at live performances.
Thank you very much.
